mapper.select: update INSBDeliveryaddress set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},ownername = #{ownername},owneridcardno = #{owneridcardno},recipientname = #{recipientname},recipientmobilephone = #{recipientmobilephone},recipientprovince = #{recipientprovince},recipientcity = #{recipientcity},recipientarea = #{recipientarea},recipientaddress = #{recipientaddress},zip = #{zip} where id = #{id}
